00020 #include "CalvinCHPMultiDataFileWriter.h"
00021 #include "CHPMultiDataData.h"
00022 
00023 using namespace std;
00024 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00025 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_parameter;
00026 
00027 CHPMultiDataFileWriter::CHPMultiDataFileWriter(CHPMultiDataData &p)
00028 {
00029     data = &p;
00030     map<MultiDataType, DataSetInfo> &info = p.GetDataSetInfo();
00031     map<MultiDataType, DataSetInfo>::iterator it;
00032     for (it=info.begin(); it!=info.end(); it++)
00033     {
00034         dataTypeToIndex[it->first] = it->second.dataSetIndex;
00035         indexToDataType[it->second.dataSetIndex] = it->first;
00036     }
00037         writer = new GenericFileWriter(p.GetFileHeader());
00038         WriteHeaders();
00039 }
00040 
00041 CHPMultiDataFileWriter::~CHPMultiDataFileWriter()
00042 {
00043     data = NULL;
00044         delete writer;
00045 }
00046 
00047 void CHPMultiDataFileWriter::WriteHeaders()
00048 {
00049         writer->WriteHeader();
00050         DataGroupWriter &dataGroupWriter = writer->GetDataGroupWriter(0);
00051         dataGroupWriter.WriteHeader();
00052 
00053     int32_t n = dataGroupWriter.GetDataSetWriterCnt();
00054     for (int32_t i=0; i<n; i++)
00055     {
00056         dataSetWriter = &dataGroupWriter.GetDataSetWriter(i);
00057                 dataSetWriter->WriteHeader();
00058                 entryPos[indexToDataType[i]] = SetFilePositions();
00059                 dataGroupWriter.UpdateNextDataGroupPos();
00060         }
00061 }
00062 
00063 int32_t CHPMultiDataFileWriter::SetFilePositions()
00064 {
00065         int32_t dataSetSz = dataSetWriter->GetDataSetSize();
00066         int32_t offset = writer->GetFilePos();
00067         writer->SeekFromCurrentPos(dataSetSz + 1);
00068         dataSetWriter->UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00069         return offset;
00070 }
00071 
00072 void CHPMultiDataFileWriter::SeekToDataSet(MultiDataType dataType)
00073 {
00074         DataGroupWriter &dataGroupWriter = writer->GetDataGroupWriter(0);
00075         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(entryPos[dataType]);
00076         dataSetWriter = &dataGroupWriter.GetDataSetWriter(dataTypeToIndex[dataType]);
00077     maxProbeSetName = data->GetMaxProbeSetName(dataType);
00078     currentDataType = dataType;
00079     seekPos = true;
00080 }
00081 
00082 void CHPMultiDataFileWriter::WriteEntry(const affymetrix_calvin_data::ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData & p)
00083 {
00084     //if (seekPos == true)
00085     {
00086         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(entryPos[currentDataType]);
00087         seekPos = false;
00088     }
00089     dataSetWriter->Write(p.name, maxProbeSetName);
00090         dataSetWriter->Write(p.call);
00091         dataSetWriter->Write(p.confidence);
00092     WriteMetrics(p.metrics);
00093     entryPos[currentDataType] = writer->GetFilePos();
00094 }
00095 
00096 void CHPMultiDataFileWriter::WriteEntry(const affymetrix_calvin_data::ProbeSetMultiDataCopyNumberData & p)
00097 {
00098     //if (seekPos == true)
00099     {
00100         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(entryPos[currentDataType]);
00101         seekPos = false;
00102     }
00103     dataSetWriter->Write(p.name, maxProbeSetName);
00104         dataSetWriter->Write(p.chr);
00105         dataSetWriter->Write(p.position);
00106     WriteMetrics(p.metrics);
00107     entryPos[currentDataType] = writer->GetFilePos();
00108 }
00109 
00110 void CHPMultiDataFileWriter::WriteEntry(const affymetrix_calvin_data::ProbeSetMultiDataCytoRegionData & p)
00111 {
00112     //if (seekPos == true)
00113     {
00114         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(entryPos[currentDataType]);
00115         seekPos = false;
00116     }
00117     dataSetWriter->Write(p.name, maxProbeSetName);
00118     dataSetWriter->Write(p.chr);
00119     dataSetWriter->Write(p.startPosition);
00120     dataSetWriter->Write(p.stopPosition);
00121     dataSetWriter->Write(p.call);
00122     dataSetWriter->Write(p.confidenceScore);
00123     WriteMetrics(p.metrics);
00124     entryPos[currentDataType] = writer->GetFilePos();
00125 }

00127 void CHPMultiDataFileWriter::WriteEntry(const affymetrix_calvin_data::ProbeSetMultiDataExpressionData & p)
00128 {
00129     //if (seekPos == true)
00130     {
00131         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(entryPos[currentDataType]);
00132         seekPos = false;
00133     }
00134     dataSetWriter->Write(p.name, maxProbeSetName);
00135         dataSetWriter->Write(p.quantification);
00136     WriteMetrics(p.metrics);
00137     entryPos[currentDataType] = writer->GetFilePos();
00138 }
00139 
00140 void CHPMultiDataFileWriter::WriteMetrics(const std::vector<affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType> &metrics)
00141 {
00142         int ncols = (int) metrics.size();
00143         for (int icol=0; icol<ncols; icol++)
00144         {
00145                 const ParameterNameValueType &nv = metrics[icol];
00146                 switch (nv.GetParameterType())
00147                 {
00148                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int8Type:
00149                                 dataSetWriter->Write(nv.GetValueInt8());
00150                                 break;
00151 
00152                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt8Type:
00153                                 dataSetWriter->Write(nv.GetValueUInt8());
00154                                 break;
00155 
00156                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int16Type:
00157                                 dataSetWriter->Write(nv.GetValueInt16());
00158                                 break;
00159 
00160                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt16Type:
00161                                 dataSetWriter->Write(nv.GetValueUInt16());
00162                                 break;
00163 
00164                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int32Type:
00165                                 dataSetWriter->Write(nv.GetValueInt32());
00166                                 break;
00167 
00168                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt32Type:
00169                                 dataSetWriter->Write(nv.GetValueUInt32());
00170                                 break;
00171 
00172                         case ParameterNameValueType::FloatType:
00173                                 dataSetWriter->Write(nv.GetValueFloat());
00174                                 break;
00175 
00176                         case ParameterNameValueType::AsciiType:
00177                                 dataSetWriter->Write(nv.GetValueAscii(), data->GetMetricColumnLength(currentDataType, icol));
00178                                 break;
00179 
00180                         case ParameterNameValueType::TextType:
00181                                 dataSetWriter->Write(nv.GetValueText(), data->GetMetricColumnLength(currentDataType, icol));
00182                                 break;
00183         // @todo check this is ok.
00184     case ParameterNameValueType::UnknownType:
00185       break;
00186                 }
00187         }
00188 }
